version: 5.1.9 - Auto-Update Bug Fix & Enhanced Mobile UX
description: Auto-Update Bug Fix & Enhanced Mobile UX
features: Fixed auto-update bug causing false 'New version available' messages
Disabled auto-updates in production for better user experience
Updated fallback version handling to prevent version mismatches
Improved mobile font and emoji sizes for better readability
Enhanced touch targets with minimum 56px height for activities, 64px for categories
Click-to-edit functionality for categories and activities in management
Added edit cogs on home page categories and activity listings
Softened harsh red delete buttons with gray default and red hover
